content: traditional instructions for the pattern as well as shorthand in italics here are examples of what crochet shorthand looks like single_crochet 1 means single_crochet in the next stitch single_crochet 2 means single_crochet in the next two stitches 2 single_crochet means work two single crochets in the next stitch thank you so much to michelle donato for testing this pattern @mtd1026 on instagram 1 https //dananield com/heirloom-cable-sampler-crochet-baby-blanket/
